spec.name: Driver
spec.subtitle: The Need for Speed
spec.description: Drivers are highly valued almost anywhere they go. Companies, military and security units, governments, and criminal factions all have a regular need for those who can transport personnel and goods over a planet's surface. Additionally, more than a few planets in the Outer Rim have traditions of racing of one style or another, and Drivers are naturals for being able to enter such competitions and walk away with a decent purse. Naturally, this depends on their skill and their ability to avoid being killed by other Drivers.

talents.name: Full Throttle
talents.description: Take a Full Throttle action: make a Hard Piloting check ot increase a vehicle's top speed by 1 for a number of rounds equal to Cunning.

talents.name: All-Terrain Driver
talents.description: Do not suffer usual penalties for driving through difficulty terrain when using Piloting (Planetary).

talents.name: Fine Tuning
talents.description: When reducing the amount of system strain a starship or vehicle suffers, reduce 1 additional strain per rank of Fine Tuning.

talents.name: Gearhead
talents.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Gearhead from Mechanics checks. Halve the credit cost to add mods to attachments.

talents.name: Grit
talents.description: Gain +1 Strain Threshold

talents.name: Skilled Jockey
talents.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Skilled Jockey from all Piloting (Planetary) and Piloting (Space) checks the character attempts.

talents.name: Rapid Reaction
talents.description: Suffer a number of strain no greater than ranks in Rapid Reaction, then add an equal number of Success to initiative checks.

talents.name: Grit
talents.description: Gain +1 Strain Threshold

talents.name: Improved Full Throttle
talents.description: Suffer 1 strain to attempt Full Throttle as a maneuver and decrease its difficulty to Average.

talents.name: Tricky Target
talents.description: Count vehicle or starship piloted as having a silhouette 1 lower when being attacked.

talents.name: Fine Tuning
talents.description: When reducing the amount of system strain a starship or vehicle suffers, reduce 1 additional strain per rank of Fine Tuning.

talents.name: Toughened
talents.description: Gain +2 Wound Threshold

talents.name: Defensive Driving
talents.description: Increase defense of vehicle or starship being piloted by 1 per rank of Defensive Driving.

talents.name: Skilled Jockey
talents.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Skilled Jockey from all Piloting (Planetary) and Piloting (Space) checks the character attempts.

talents.name: Natural Driver
talents.description: Once per session, may re-roll any 1 Piloting (Planetary) or Gunnery check.

talents.name: Gearhead
talents.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Gearhead from Mechanics checks. Halve the credit cost to add mods to attachments.

talents.name: Supreme Full Throttle
talents.description: When performing Full Throttle, top speed increases by 2 instead of 1.

talents.name: Full Stop
talents.description: When piloting a ship or vehicle, take a full-stop maneuver to reduce speed to zero and suffer system strain equal to the speed reduced.

talents.name: Master Driver
talents.description: Once per round when driving a vehicle, may suffer 2 strain to perform any action as a maneuver.

talents.name: Dedication
talents.description: Gain +1 to a single characteristic. This cannot bring a characteristic above 6
